郎.definition: (arch.) minister; official; noun prefix denoting function or status; a youth

郎世寧.definition: Giuseppe Castiglione (1688-1766), Jesuit missionary and artist who served as a painter in the Qing court for 50 years

郎中.definition: doctor (Chinese medicine); ancient official title; companions (respectful)

郎君.definition: my husband and master (archaic); playboy of rich family; pimp

郎平.definition: Jenny Lang Ping (1960-), Chinese former volleyball player and coach

郎才女貌.definition: talented man and beautiful woman; ideal couple

郎溪.definition: Langxi, a county in Xuancheng 宣城[Xuan1cheng2], Anhui

郎溪縣.definition: Langxi, a county in Xuancheng 宣城[Xuan1cheng2], Anhui
